creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: a (vest):  sleeveless; machine embroidered neckband; open front; front and back covered with cross stitch embroidery of red, green, black and yellow, stitched to black twill backing; back piece lined in machine printed green and white fabric; b (jacket):  very long in back and short in front; light blue sleeves, 2/3 covered with cross stitch geometric embroidery; same embroidered pattern on bottom 1/3 of back in reds, green, black and white; middle back has three horizontal bands of batik; top of back and front is brown
title: Jacket with Vest
